reviews.review: Great game. GladOS is mean and needs a hug.
The original Portal was fun. Portal 2 is WAY BETTER! This is definitely my favorite game on Steam so far. It's a great combination of puzzles, humor, and action in an FPS style game
It's like the original portal times two.
Es un juego bastante divertido, yo lo recomiendo para todo el que se encuentre aburrido

It's Portal 2; it's hilarious, challenging, quirky, scary, delightful, difficult, and just plain old GOOD. You'd be insane not to get this, especially if it's on sale for as low as I got it last year - one buck! This is a game that needs your attention. Now.
one up and one down and you go down and down and down and down and down for a very long time
今年夏促3元入手，玩了半小时感觉不错，可玩性高。
Very cool, very swag, I like it!
Played the first, second, and... oh...

Great game love the graphics and the amazing structures. It has a really interesting story I look forward to learning more about and the over all premise of the game is well thought out, I've really enjoyed playing around with the mechanics and working my way through all the puzzles. If you are a gamer and have some how never played a portal game I would definitely recommend it.
Really enjoyed this game, I feel like this game is one you and a friend should buy. The company of a friend can make any game, not only that you can always laugh at your friend's despairs and fails.
Gerek espirileriyle gerek beyin yakan ama çözünce sevindiren bulmacalarıyla hala oynamadıysanız, Portal 2 herkese tavisyemdir.
Silly man lady (female man) makes holes in silly little walls. and haha robots are haaaaaahaaaa
Honestly, this game is amazing. Recently got it and enjoyed every bit of it.
Fun if you like duo puzzles!
One of the greatest games I have ever played, clever level design, good story and really funny writing. With the price that it has, its an absolute steal. I would recommend it to anyone.
Fun with friends, fun without any (;c). Literally less than a dollar when on sale. All time classic with mods that go above and beyond. For less than a fuckin' dollar.

Fun, Intuitive, Still a fantastic play in 2019. Thanks Valve.

Great fun with friends and AMAZING story.
